phrases: Interviews with Monster Girls
Takahashi Tetsuo Wants to Protect
Oh, her?
She is...
kind of arrogant, do not you think?
I admit she is cute,
but she could hang out with him once, at least.
Maybe she thinks she is some kind of idol...
Biology Prep Room
Kusakabe?
T-Takahashi-sensei...
What is wrong?
I-It is just...
I heard people...
s-saying mean things... about me.
I see.
Well, this is not the place to talk about it.
Let us go inside.
Is it because I am a demi?!
If I were not a demi,
I would not feel like this...
Do not worry.
That is not true.
That is not true, Kusakabe.
Takahashi-sensei...
I have to protect her.
I have to protect this demi-chan!
Generally speaking,
gossip is a trivial issue, common among high school girls.
But since she is a demi,
this particular issue is not quite that simple.
Hikari and Machi have accepted that, and are living normally enough...
Satou-sensei?
Hydrangeas, eh?
There were lots of them in the garden,
so I borrowed a few.
Are you working, Takahashi-sensei?
With the weather like this, staying in that dark prep room is depressing.
Um... I was wrong about you, Takahashi-sensei.
Huh?
The thing with Machi-san's backpack...
I happened to hear you asking the principal to help.
Oh, that
You are someone so considerate of demis,
and on the day of the opening ceremony, I behaved that way toward you!
I am so sorry!
Oh, not at all!
I should apologize for being insensitive to your situation.
As for the backpack, Hikari...
Takanashi asked me to help.
Takanashi-san?
The older sister, you mean?
Yeah.
I work so closely with those girls,
but I did not understand anything.
I want to understand them better, but...
Um, Sensei?
Yes?
Um...
C-Can I be of any help at all?
Huh?
I am a demi, after all!
Yes, I have experienced that firsthand.
I mean...
A-And I am also a teacher!
I have a duty to address the concerns of my demi students!
With that in mind, I really think I can help!
Oops.
No, I think that sounds perfect...
I would appreciate your help.
All right!
So, the students who said mean things about Kusakabe...
It seems they constantly gossip about others that way.
Then, Kusakabe-san was not being specifically targeted?
Probably not.
But she is convinced that it is because she is a demi?
What do you think, Satou-sensei?
Even without considering the gossip,
Kusakabe-san seems to avoid contact with other people, to begin with.
I mean, in a different way than I do.
Yeah, I get that impression.
It may be that she has some reason.
A reason.
You mean something like her family?
I have a feeling it is more connected to her nature as a demi.
Her nature?
The reason I had the wrong idea about you
was because my succubus nature made me overly self-conscious.
I see...
There is that way of looking at it.
She probably does not have anyone to talk to about it,
which makes it even harder to come to terms with her demi identity.
I guess I should have tried to talk to her sooner...
Well, why do not I try to speak to her?
Talking to another demi might be easier for her.
That would be a big help.
I am really glad you are on this with me.
N-N-N-Not at all!
It is just what any teacher ought to do!
Talking to Kusakabe is important...
But we should also deal with the students who were gossiping.
You are right.
Telling them to stop will not work.
They do not want people to know they feel inferior,
but they are afraid to face their victims.
I believe that mental weakness
is what makes people gossip about others.
If possible,
I would like them to realize that they do not have to fall back on gossip.
Yes.
Maybe it would be unfair to expect that from high school students...
Now, what to do?
Takanashi-san, wait a minute.
Hey, where are we going?
Hey, Takanashi-san...
Takanashi-san!
Hikari?
And they just left it like that.
No way!
That is crazy!
Also, I heard the physics teacher, Iwai, is being sent to another school.
Takanashi-san...
Yukki, I am going to give them a piece of my mind.
Really?
Why?
You wait here and listen.
He got involved in some risky stuff, I heard.
What the heck?
I will let you decide what happens afterward.
With that face, maybe it cannot be helped.
You think he went after someone?
No way.
He would not have the guts.
What a loser!
Are not you from class B?
Oh, the vampire.
Takanashi...
Is trashing people behind their backs all you ever do?
Give it a rest.
Huh?
Oh, is this about Kusakabe?
As a fellow demi, you are out to avenge her?
That is cool of
No!
Yes, Yukki is a demi, but it does not matter!
I am giving you two a piece of my mind
because that is what I want to do!
Do not try to dodge it by provoking me!
If you do not want to stop blabbing about people, then fine...
But every time I see or hear you doing it,
I will call you on it.
If you want to hang around and badmouth people,
you would better do it where I cannot find you.
Sensei...
We are not the only ones who talk about people behind their backs.
Why single us out?
It will not be just you two.
I will give a piece of my mind to anyone I catch badmouthing someone else!
Why are you so gung-ho about this?
Everyone talks about people behind their backs.
I cannot stand the excuse that everyone does it!
Everyone hurts people,
so you think you are allowed to hurt people?
Are not you ashamed to say that?
No one in the world likes being badmouthed!
What, so you never talk about anyone behind their back?
No.
If I want to say something, I say it to their face.
If I cannot, I say nothing.
You think that will keep people from talking about you?
No, I do not.
I know as soon as I leave,
you two will start griping about me.
Sorry.
It was mean of me to say it that way.
Huh?
Er, s-sure...
I know people who do not badmouth others still get badmouthed.
In fact, they are probably the easiest to badmouth.
But I have made up my mind!
It is just for my satisfaction, but...
Even if people say mean things about me, I will not do anything I will regret!
Are you... crying?
Sorry, I have said what I wanted to say.
I will go now.
I cannot agree with what you said,
but I am kind of impressed.
Still, why would you say all that?
Because I promised...
I promised my sister.
Your sister?
Takanashi Hima
Ku...
Kusakabe...
I am sorry!
I, um...
The truth is, things about my demi nature still bother me,
so I have always avoided contact with people.
If that gave you a bad impression,
well...
I am sorry.
Why are you apologizing?
We are the ones who should...
Sorry.
Wha
The rain stopped.
You
You hungry?
I will treat you to something.
Ow, ow, ow!
It hurts when you rub my head where my hair's tied up!
Sorry about that.
If you are going to rub it, rub the back!
I am home.
Huh?
Do not ask.
Wh-Where did this come from?
Do not ask.
Did something happen at school?
No, I am fine.
Interviews with Monster Girls
Audiovisual Room
The thing is, a student came to talk to me recently...
I had my own thoughts about it, so I called you all here.
Satou-sensei, too.
Someone talked to you?
It was not me.
Me, either.
Do you guys have no tact?
S-Sorry.
W-We could not help it!
Only three of us are here!
Anyway, I know there are many things demis might worry about now.
I would like for you three to be able to help each other out.
You three are the only demi students at this school.
I would like you to treasure that link among you.
If you cannot confide in your friends, you can come to me or Satou-sensei.
In particular, Satou-sensei, is a demi, like you, as well as a woman.
There is no one you can trust more.
I would rather be the one seeking advice from
F-Feel free to talk to me anytime, too!
That is all I wanted to say.
I hope you are aware that getting together to discuss things like this is important.
Does anyone have anything they would like to talk about right now?
I guess you cannot think of anything on the fly?
That will be all for today, then
I have not gotten a hug from you yet!
Huh?
Hug?
Hi-yah!
Squeeze...
Hee hee.
Ha ha...
What?
Hee hee hee!
Ha ha ha.
Seriously, what?
C-Can I have one, too?
Huh?
Sure.
Thank you.
No problem.
Good for you, Macchi!
Yep.
Takahashi-sensei...
I will take one, too
No, that is a bad idea...
You are right.
Uh...
How about it, Kusakabe?
If you would like one, too...
While we are at it.
Huh?
While you are at it?!
Kusakabe...
I will not force you to talk about what is troubling you.
Like I said before,
I believe it is fate that you are in an environment
where you are surrounded by other demis.
So...
I cannot say it well, but I am sure it will get better.
You will have fun.
So do not worry.
Okay?
Yes.
Sensei, Sensei!
Give her a hug, too!
Her?
But that is Machi.
Just while you are at it!
Sheesh...
Is that all right, Machi?
Uh, sure.
All right, then...
Well, that will be all for today.
Takahashi-sensei, what was that weird scream?!
What happened?
Sensei, wait!
I have a question!
I want to know what that reaction meant!
He called all the demis together for a meeting?
Yeah, Takahashi-sensei had them meet in the AV room after classes.
Takahashi-sensei did?
Hikari-chan said it was a lot of fun.
He seems pretty spacey, but he is actually very caring.
Hmm...
What?
Oh, nothing.
To tell the truth, I still do not trust Takahashi-sensei!
I got careless since it was just her body, and I hugged too hard.
I wonder if Machi noticed.
Yeah, of course she did...
Hey.
Hello.
I did not know teachers were allowed to leave so early.
Oh, yeah...
And I see you stayed pretty late, Himari-chan.
I did.
I like the library.
Come to think of it, I hear you did amazingly well on the last exams.
Th-Thank you.
You always study in the library?
Y-Yes, and I read books to refresh myself.
I see.
You are nothing like Hikari, huh?
That was suspicious.
He is always nice to Onee-chan, but...
What is wrong?
N-Nothing...
Just worried that my sister's been bothering you.
I have been letting her cool off in the biology prep room.
Is that right?
Or are you actually looking at her as an experimental sample?
Oh, the experiment.
I forgot to prepare one for tomorrow's class.
I hope I will have enough materials for everyone.
Well, I can do it tomorrow.
I am overthinking this...
Even if he does love demis,
there is no way he thinks about the nature of vampires around the clock.
Oh, right!
I wanted to ask you something about the nature of vampires.
He actually does!
Wh-What would that be?
Hikari seems to have no problem chowing down on garlic,
but the stories you hear posit that vampires hate garlic.
I was thinking about whether it was all fake.
R-Right...
They say vampires attack humans at night, under cover of darkness.
Why do you think that is?
Uh, is not it because they hate sunlight?
I do not think that makes them scary enough for people to carry crosses.
Some texts say that vampires have very keen senses.
I think that is the reason.
Sharp vision, even at night, hearing that can detect humans,
a sharp sense of smell to pick up the scent of blood.
That is more than enough for an advantage over humans in the dark.
What does the sharpness of their senses have to do with garlic?
Oh, the key point is their sense of smell.
Since their noses are so sensitive, they hate strong-smelling foods.
I think that is why vampires in legends hate garlic.
I have been thinking about those things, but what is the real story?
Does Hikari have sharp senses?
I think that is an accurate perception.
My sister's senses are incredible.
Oh!
All right!
Then, how can she eat so much garlic?
That is because...
She just is not picky enough about her food.
I got concerned and asked her if she was forcing herself to eat it.
And she said...
It is fine, it is fine!
I love foods that smell really strong!
I would not want her to say that in public.
You can say that again...
Lots of people who talk to me about my sister say
she does not seem like a vampire,
that she is just like a normal high school girl.
You seem very interested in demis' natures,
so what do you think of that?
Do you think my sister does not seem like a vampire?!
Are you not that interested in her human side?
Okay, I will give you a straight answer.
It is true that she does not behave the way I would expect a vampire to.
But if you asked whether that makes her unlike a vampire,
I would say it does not.
Hikari does want to suck people's blood,
but she settles for blood bags.
And even though she has a vampire's keen sense of smell,
she loves foods with strong scents.
That human side is what makes her like a vampire,
and it is what makes her unique.
It is not how you are born that makes you like something.
It is how you live with what you are.
But that does not mean it is okay to neglect an understanding of a demi's nature.
The concerns unique to demis are caused by their natures.
You cannot look at things in only one way.
You should look from both angles.
If you just see traits unique to demis, you will miss their individuality.
If you only see the human side, you will not understand their troubles.
Both are precious.
What is important is balance.
That is what I think.
I am at a loss for words.
Maybe I can trust him...
Um, Sensei...
What is up?
Would you like to come to our house sometime?
Oh, I did, not long ago.
In front of it, anyway.
I would like my parents to hear what you just said.
Oh, okay!
Actually, I was thinking I would like to talk to your parents, too.
Sensei...
Hmm?
Incidentally, I have a question for you!
What does hugging my sister let you learn?
Sensei hugged me today!
He totally attacked me!
Was it her vampire nature, or her human side?!
Shibasaki Station
Hugged?
Attacked?!
What is she thinking?
You have got it wrong, Himari-chan!
She is the one who
You...
Rationalizing, demi-loving teacher!
I do not deny that, but still!
Onee-chan?
Onee-chan, are you oka
And why send me such a misleading message?
I am sorry...
You were so late getting home, and I was bored here.
I thought if I sent a message like that, you would come home faster.
I had no idea Sensei was with you.
If you would just sent a message asking me to hurry home, I would have.
Really?
I love you, Himari!
Quit clinging to me!
Next Time Snow Woman-chan Is Cold
Snow Woman-chan Is Cold.
